title: 1 Bedroom in Evanston Steps to Northwestern - Starting 9/1/2022
neighborhood: Evanston - Northwestern University, Rogers Park, Edgewater
posting_body: Located in Downtown Evanston and steps to Northwestern University, this Evanston apartment is close to the Metra Train, Post office, bakery, restaurants, and banks!
You can not be more centrally located in Evanston than this!
Easy commute to Rogers Park, Edgewater, West Ridge, Lincoln Square and Downtown Chicago.
2nd month rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease!
Utility package additional $86 covers heat, water, and trash.
Tenants pays electricity and cooking gas separately.
Visit our website at www.1009davis.com for more information and similar apartments.
